title: Fix post-meeting recap generation in sales_followup_recommendations when meeting metadata is missing

sections.text: Post-meeting follow-up recommendations fail to generate a recap for some opportunities when the CRM meeting record is missing or has empty fields (attendees, notes/transcript link, or outcome). Add defensive handling and fallbacks so recap + next-step templates still render with best-available data, and log structured errors when required inputs are truly unavailable. Ensure the UI shows a clear “recap unavailable” state instead of silently omitting recommendations.
